sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BBS_ADD (BBS_ADD_SEQ, BBS_SEQ, CONTENT, REG_EMAIL, REG_IP, UPD_EMAIL, UPD_IP) VALUES (BBS_ADD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #bbs_seq#, #content#, #reg_email#, #reg_ip#, #reg_email#, #reg_ip#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') REG_DATE, GOODCOUNT FROM BBS_ADD WHERE BBS_SEQ=#bbs_seq# order by bbs_add_seq desc
